meaning_str.bing:
auxv. 应该；本应；总应该；早应该
n. 〈口〉零；〈古〉同“aught”

应该；本应；总应该；早应该

（~ to）应该；应当（表示义务、责任、合适、必要）；该（表示可能性、期望）；应该（表示愿望）；有义务；有责任；理应；预料会做；（~ to have done）早应该；本该；本当

1.en: If he has any doubt as to which side he ought to be on, he need only ask that bellwether of public opinion, his old friend Oprah Winfrey.
1.cn: 如果他对支持哪一方有任何疑虑的话，他只需要问问民意代表，他的老朋友OprahWinfrey。

2.en: Now, after it's all over, you come and tell me that I ought't to go with him and that he's a married man.
2.cn: 现在玩过了，你倒跑来对我说，我不该和他来往的，他是有妇之夫。

3.en: She was in charge at the time and, if she did not know, she ought to have done.
3.cn: 她当时是《世界新闻报》的掌门人，如果她不知道，那真是太不应该了。

1.en: Perhaps you ought to go. It might wake up.
1.cn: 你们快走吧，它可随时会醒过来。

2.en: That ought to do it. Hi. It's me. Oh, good!
2.cn: 事情好办了。我回来了。正好！

3.en: The stable clock's fast. We ought to get back.
3.cn: 马厩的钟快了，我们得走了。

4.en: Yes, you ought, stupid girl. Unroll the Oraculum.
4.cn: 是的，你知道，傻女孩，打开那个预言卷轴。

5.en: A retard? Well, shoot, that ought to tell you something.
5.cn: 智障？你也该看出来一些事吧。

6.en: Why do I still remember everything? I ought to have been wiped.
6.cn: 为什么我什么都记得？我的记忆应该被清除了才对。

7.en: Anyway, let's not talk about it now. We ought to join the others.
7.cn: 但是现在先不谈这个，我们也去用餐吧。

8.en: We shall see. What do you mean by that? I ought to know who I am.
8.cn: 那我们来瞧瞧。你什么意思？我当然知道我自己是谁。

9.en: You ought to be careful. People will think you're up to something.
9.cn: 得小心点，人们会以为你们在干坏事。

10.en: We ought to look at the costs. It's good of you to come with me today.
10.cn: 我们该看一下成本，今天你能陪我来真好。

11.en: There, that ought to do it. There, I'll give you some change for the bus fare.
11.cn: 好了，应该可以了，过来，我给你点零钱搭公交。

12.en: I ought to do some shopping while I'm here. I haven't had anything new in ages.
12.cn: 正好来了，我也该买点衣服，我好久没买新衣服了。

13.en: I don't know if that was meaningful or senile, but I thought it ought to be said.
13.cn: 我不知道这话是否有意义，还是我老糊涂了，但我觉得应该告诉你。

14.en: Ooh, is this one of those paintball guns? Yeah. You ought to come out with us sometime.
14.cn: 这就是你们的彩弹枪？没错，你下次应该和我们一起来。

15.en: Why ask the question when the decision has been made? Come on, we ought to join the others.
15.cn: 既然已经做出了决定，何必多问？走吧，去找其他人。

16.en: Please lie down. I've got a salve that ought to shrink that right up. I guess it's worth a try.
16.cn: 请趴下，我有一种药膏可以让它缩小，值得一试。

17.en: Looking round the table, I wonder if we ought to have opened Grantham House. I feel rather guilty.
17.cn: 看看这一桌，我在想我们是不是该开放格兰瑟姆大宅，我觉得有点愧疚。

18.en: Now, you listen to me, all three of you. You're meddling in things that ought not to be meddled in.
18.cn: 你们都听着，给我听好，你们在管那些不应该管的事。

19.en: Is there anything you can tell us about the Tesseract that we ought to know now? You should have left it in the ocean.
19.cn: 对于找回魔方你有什么具体的建议吗？你们应该把它留在海里。
